title: Easy To Say
body:
Itâ€™s always easy to say,
I do nothing, Itâ€™s my job.
Itâ€™s always easy to say,
I do nothing, Just earn money to spend on.
Itâ€™s always easy for you,
To break my faith and courage that I make.
Yes, I am Man. Carrying all the pain, still smiling.
Yes, This is my job.
Itâ€™s always easy to say,
You carry my child and raise for so long.
I did nothing, just gave a name and thatâ€™s all.
Itâ€™s always easy for you to say,
You make a living place home.
Yes, I know you do lot of things,
That why I try keep all my pain away so you can focus more.
I do all dirty fight for you, so that you and our love ones can live more.
Yes you can say, I give just a name.
But I want people think before they try to harm you more.
Yes, I am Man. I donâ€™t know.
How to say, Itâ€™s not easy to say I care, I care a lot.||

title: Lady in the dark
body:
Yesterday i was laying on body of some unknown,
Today i'm laying on the body of someone i hardy know.
Yesterday i had to smile fake on less knowing facts,
Today i'm smiling to talk i hardly interest at.
Yesterday i had to answer the questions that i hate,
Today i had to create questions to avoid debate.
Yesterday also i was conveniencing myself, May be today is last day of my sadness and pain
Today also i'm cheating everyone else including myself,
May be this is the last man on my bed.
